DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) , dose limit toxicity ( DLT ) , safety profile CHIR-258 administer subject refractory relapse multiple myeloma ( MM ) .
DOC.brief_title: TKI258 Subjects With Refractory Relapsed Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis multiple myeloma Evidence relapse refractory disease Intracranial disease epidural disease Clinically significant cardiac disease Diabetes mellitus
